data.what_is:
XEquals is the student conversion platform that's dedicated to helping eliminate the guesswork around student enrollment, to make your time and budget work harder in the right places.

XEquals is powered by a team of Xperts, many of whom have been former admissions and marketing professionals working in Higher Education Institutions. When they realized the questions they'd been asking themselves for months or years could be answered with this technology, they came aboard to help shape the platform as we see it today.

XEquals seamlessly integrates with all student CRMs and all of your digital marketing channels to create a connected picture of your recruitment funnel, and immediately identify where improvements need to be made.

Our team then proactively turns those insights into actions to help your numbers go up and your spend go down.
data.product_description: Akero is a digital inbound and outbound marketing and lead generation platform, used by over 300 organisations, built with agencies and brands in mind.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Akero?
It's quick and performance. I especially like that most use cases conclude in far less time than our previous alternatives. It's so good that we've migrated completely to Akero!

What do you dislike about Akero?
The change management associated with something like Akero can be quite difficult. Also, maintaining it is occasionally arduous, but I blame this on our own lack of familiarity.

What problems is Akero solving and how is that benefiting you?
Well, I'm using it as a one-stop shop for services. I'm handling it completely in Akero, and this really cuts down on context switching, and boosts my productivity as an end-result.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Akero?
Great software for lead nurture and management.

What do you dislike about Akero?
what is the least helpful about akero and

What problems is Akero solving and how is that benefiting you?
Akero allows me to create eye-catching landing pages and workflows to track lead sources.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Akero?
review_question_answers.answer: Great software for lead nurture and management.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Akero?
review_question_answers.answer: what is the least helpful about akero and

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Akero solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Akero allows me to create eye-catching landing pages and workflows to track lead sources.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Akero?
I like the drag and drop features for building the landing pages. They are very intuitive and easy to use.
The email workflows are easy to set up and are very useful.

What do you dislike about Akero?
The landing page builder is sometimes confusing as its missing values for some parameters (you have sliders that don't display the current value). I have also noticed that drag and drop features do not act the same in different scenarios.
It's modular and the basic version is a bit limited.

Recommendations to others considering Akero:
It's worth implementing and trying wether it matches the goals of enterprise/organization. First it may appear something that you can replace with several tools, but in the end it's better to have it in one place.

What problems is Akero solving and how is that benefiting you?
At our school we are managing leads using Akero CRM. It helps to keep all the relevant information in one place and contact the potential candidates. We also use it for making the landing pages and email automations. It also makes it easy to embed the forms in our website.
